metadata.name: HackTool - SharpMove Tool Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of SharpMove, a .NET utility performing multiple tasks such as "Task Creation", "SCM" query, VBScript execution using WMI via its PE metadata and command line options.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sharpmove.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sharpmove.exe') OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('computername=')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=create')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=dcom')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=executevbs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=hijackdcom')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=modschtask')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=modsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=query')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=scm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=startservice')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=taskscheduler')))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of SharpMove, a .NET utility performing multiple tasks such as "Task Creation", "SCM" query, VBScript execution using WMI via its PE metadata and command line options.
